title: How to bring your 1980s retro bathroom into the modern day
content:
Less than three weeks after Cate Blanchett and her husband Andrew Upton listed their Hunters Hill trophy home for sale, it has sold. 
  
Domain’s pick of good-value properties this week. 
  
A London skyscraper that made headlines for reflecting sunlight at an intensity that melted parts of a Jaguar car in the street below has been awarded the annual Carbuncle Cup. 
  
New research has cast doubt on claims foreign investment is pushing up house prices. 
  
The former Bradmill denim factory in Yarraville has been sold to a local developer for more than $160 million. 
  
The hot property market of Ultimo is expected to receive a further boost with the opening of the Goods Line on Sunday. 
  
People don’t make Pinterest accounts and write blogs about the #journey of their granny flat, and that’s a good thing. 
  
Discover how to strike a balance between functionality and aesthetics with advice from the experts. 
  
They aren’t as far away as you might think. 
  
TV personality Livinia Nixon has put her pretty Middle Park home on the market.
